home.intro1: A grounded space on this planet that supports you in reconnecting with your inner strength.
home.intro2: Every challenge can be met through your own capacity, as the soul never presents lessons beyond what you are able to integrate.
home.intro3: All services provided here—including divination, energy healing, and intuitive guidance—are designed to support your self-healing process. They are not meant to replace personal responsibility or readiness to face reality, as true healing cannot be outsourced.
home.intro4: The path we walk together is nourishment—so that you may be well, and continue becoming better.

services.heroSubtitle: Experience the art of candle making with our exclusive workshops and bespoke event services. Crafted for moments that matter.
services.gridDescription: Discover more about our service and how it can bring light to your life.

point1.title: 理學碩士
point1.line2: 一直以來都是念理工科系

point.title: 外商軟體工程師/專案經理
point.line1: 曾任台灣最大外商的軟體工程師及專案經理
point.line2: 後續一直於外商軟體專案經理的職涯道路發展

point1.title: 龜毛加三級
point1.desc: 對細節吹毛求疵的完美主義者,人生中最大課題是學會”放鬆“。

point2.title: 講求邏輯
point2.desc: 骨子裡充滿“眼見為憑”的驗證心理,有時候被衝擊到還是會保持懷疑態度。

point3.title: 開放式觀點
point3.desc: 對待新的事物採取開放式的狀態在探索。

point4.title: 敏感體質
point4.desc: 有點玄學上的敏感體質但並非大師，也因此走向汲取各種玄學相關技能的道路。

point5.title: 溫暖真誠
point5.desc: 認為真誠才是在人生中最值得肯定的待人之道。
